entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
